plugin.name: Comment Generator
plugin.description:
This plugin adds a convenient 'Generate Comment' action to the context menu when right-clicking on a file. Upon selecting the action, it automatically generates and adds documentation comments to methods and functions in the file by calling the Gemini API.

For the first-time setup, users will be prompted to enter their API key, which can be stored and later updated through the pluginâ€™s settings page.

Key Benefits:

  • Automatically generates Javadoc-style comments for methods and functions in your code.
  • Prompted for an API key upon first use, with easy API key management through the settings page.
  • Simplifies the process of adding documentation, improving code readability and maintainability.

This plugin streamlines the process of adding documentation to your code with minimal effort.
plugin.change-notes:
• Introduced a dedicated icon for the Generate Comment action, enhancing visual clarity.
  • Improved regex logic for more accurate comment extraction and parsing.
  • Upgraded Gemini integration to the latest supported version for better performance.
  • Added compatibility with Kotlin K2 mode, enabling support for the latest Kotlin analysis API.
  • Refactored package structure for improved maintainability and scalability of the plugin.
  • Enhanced comment generation logic to intelligently produce both Javadoc and KDoc based on file type.
